#summary 模板管理.
#labels free,cms,freecms,freeteam,开源,免费,内容管理系统

= 模板管理 =
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">模板是指设计师已经做好的页面文件，经过处理成为模板，它可以改变网页所有的内容布局、颜色、风格等。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">从左侧管理菜单点击模板管理进入。</span></p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>1.<span>  </span></span></span></b><b><span style="font-family: 宋体">添加模板</span></b></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/201632_DUXj_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/201632_DUXj_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">点击"添加"</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/201659_cWGK_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/201659_cWGK_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">输入相关属性点击"确定"即可。</span></p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体">提示</span></b><span style="font-family: 宋体">：</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>1）<span> </span></span></span><span style="font-family: 宋体">可使用的站点可以限制使用此模板的站点，如果不选择是表示所有站点都可以使用。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>2）<span> </span></span></span><span style="font-family: 宋体">添加成功后会在<span>/templet</span>目录下生成以一个以此模板<span>id</span>为名字的文件夹。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/201728_YLbL_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/201728_YLbL_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">此文件夹下会自动生成三个文件</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/201805_rdiK_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/201805_rdiK_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">首页指使用此模板的站点首页，在首页静态化时系统会根据站点模板下的"首页</span><span>.html</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">"文件来生成站点首页。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">栏目页面指使用此模板的站点栏目页面，在栏目页静态化时系统会默认根据站点模板下的"栏目页面</span><span>.html</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">"文件来生成栏目页面，如果您指定此目录下其它文件作为栏目页面的模板文件，则系统使用您指定的页面进行静态化。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">信息页面指使用此模板的站点信息页面，在信息页静态化时系统会默认根据站点模板下的"信息页面</span><span>.html</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">"文件来生成信息页面，如果您指定此目录下其它文件作为信息页面的模板文件，则系统使用您指定的页面进行静态化。</span></p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>2.<span>  </span></span></span></b><b><span style="font-family: 宋体">编辑模板</span></b></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/201847_Slh8_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/201847_Slh8_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">选择需要编辑的模板，如"测试模板"，点击"编辑"按钮</span></p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体">注意</span></b><span style="font-family: 宋体">:</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">同时只能选择一个模板进行编辑操作。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/201923_bz3v_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/201923_bz3v_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">输入相关属性点击"确定"即可。</span></p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>3.<span>  </span></span></span></b><b><span style="font-family: 宋体">删除模板</span></b></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202013_CmQX_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202013_CmQX_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">选择需要删除的模板，如"测试模板"，点击"删除"按钮。</span></p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体">提示</span></b><span style="font-family: 宋体">:</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">同时可以选择多个模板进行删除操作。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202031_3xQs_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202031_3xQs_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">为了防止误操作，系统会确认是否操作，点击"确定"按钮即可。</span></p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>4.<span>  </span></span></span></b><b><span style="font-family: 宋体">文件管理</span></b></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">FreeCMS</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">提供了在线管理模板文件的功能。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202053_NgPb_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202053_NgPb_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">选择需要管理文件的模板，如"测试模板"，点击"文件管理"按钮。</span></p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体">注意</span></b><span style="font-family: 宋体">:</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">同时只能选择一个模板进行文件管理操作。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202117_gS7z_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202117_gS7z_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">文件管理主要有以下功能。</span></p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>a.<span>  </span></span></span></b><b><span style="font-family: 宋体">上传文件</span></b></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">您可以通过左侧的目录树进入到指定目录，然后点击"上传文件"按钮。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202140_iIjQ_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202140_iIjQ_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">选择要上传的文件，点击"确定"按钮</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202203_4W6U_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202203_4W6U_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a> <a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202248_AJHO_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202248_AJHO_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>b.<span>  </span></span></span></b><b><span style="font-family: 宋体">添加</span></b></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">您可以直接在线添加新的文件，进入指定目录然后点击"添加"按钮。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202317_FYvf_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202317_FYvf_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">输入文件名和文件内容后点击"保存"按钮即可。</span></p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体">提示</span></b><span style="font-family: 宋体">：只能添加后缀为</span><span>html</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">、</span><span>js</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">、</span><span>css</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">、</span><span>txt</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">的文件。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202345_UWR3_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202345_UWR3_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>c.<span>  </span></span></span></b><b><span style="font-family: 宋体">编辑</span></b></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">您可以直接在线编辑模板文件内容</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">，进入指定目录然后选择文件点击"编辑"按钮。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202420_KgrY_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202420_KgrY_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">输入文件名和文件内容后点击"保存"按钮即可。</span></p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体">提示</span></b><span style="font-family: 宋体">：</span></p>
<p>
	<span><span>1)<span>    </span></span></span><span style="font-family: 宋体">只能编辑后缀为</span><span>html</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">、</span><span>js</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">、</span><span>css</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">、</span><span>txt</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">的文件。</span></p>
<p>
	<span><span>2)<span>    </span></span></span><span style="font-family: 宋体">同时只能编辑一个文件。</span></p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>d.<span>  </span></span></span></b><b><span style="font-family: 宋体">删除</span></b></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">您可以直接在线删除模板文件，进入指定目录然后选择文件点击"删除"按钮。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202442_zKRW_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202442_zKRW_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a> <a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202504_lavI_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202504_lavI_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">为防止用户误操作，系统会提示确认操作，点击"确定"按钮即可。</span></p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>e.<span>  </span></span></span></b><b><span style="font-family: 宋体">创建文件夹</span></b></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">您可以直接在线创建文件夹，进入指定目录然后点击"创建文件夹"按钮。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202527_6Gum_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202527_6Gum_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">输入文件夹名称点击"确定"即可</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202547_VAxW_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202547_VAxW_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>f.<span>  </span></span></span></b><b><span style="font-family: 宋体">重命名文件夹</span></b></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">您可以直接在线重命名非根目录的文件夹，进入指定目录然后点击"重命名此文件夹"按钮。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202632_OBBv_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202632_OBBv_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">输入新的文件夹名称点击"确定"按钮即可。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202657_s6co_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202657_s6co_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>g.<span>  </span></span></span></b><b><span style="font-family: 宋体">删除文件夹</span></b></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">您可以直接在线删除非根目录的文件夹，进入指定目录然后点击"删除此文件夹"按钮。</span></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">为防止用户误操作，系统会提示确认操作，点击"确定"按钮即可。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202725_JRjh_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202725_JRjh_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体">注意</span></b><span style="font-family: 宋体">：删除文件夹会同时删除此文件夹下的所有文件。</span></p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>h.<span>  </span></span></span></b><b><span style="font-family: 宋体">刷新文件列表</span></b></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202751_IWQ7_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/202751_IWQ7_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">刷新当前文件夹，获取最新文件列表。</span></p>
